message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. I understand its value to you is $1500000. Let's make this transaction beneficial for both parties. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1400000. This is an exceptional deal considering the high demand for this product and its unique features. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further.
